name: So, You Want to Be a Squire?
name_original: So, You Want to Be a Squire?
description:
This is a game where you play a squire who dreams of becoming a knight. To accomplish this you will need to prove yourself by supporting other knights on their missions and thus earn enough renown to make your way to knighthood. So before starting your mission make sure you stock up on supplies. Buy up potions for your knight's health, swords for when your knight is only left with fisticuffs, shields for when your knight is without defense, and rations for when your knight's tummy is making the rumblies. Next, enter the mission that you choose with your knight. During the mission make sure to help your knight and collect lots of treasure so your knight spreads the word of your greatness and earn your renown. 

This is a new take on the RPG genre, where instead of playing as a knight you are playing a squire trying to make it to knighthood. There is more of a focus on resource management. Our advice--don't walk into walls!
